fields.title: Introducing the Calenduck Blog
fields.description: Introducing the Calenduck Blog - All things Calendly, Slack and Integrations
fields.preview: Today, we’re launching the Calenduck Blog.  We'll be occasionally updating this space with useful posts on all things related to Slack and Calendly. Maybe ducks as well.
fields.content:
### Today, we’re launching the Calenduck Blog  

We'll be occasionally updating this space with useful posts on all things related to [Slack](https://www.slack.com/) and [Calendly](https://calendly.com/). Maybe ducks as well.
  
For the uninitiated, [Calenduck](https://www.calenduck.co/) is a Slack bot that sends Calendly notifications to your favorite channel (or colleague 😊).

#### How do I sign up? 

You can signup by installing adding Calenduck to your workspace via the [App Directory](https://slack.com/apps/AS7JCAATV-calenduck).

Alternatively, just click on one of the button above. The bot is **totally free for the first 14 days**, after which you'll be nudged for an update everytime someone schedules (or cancels) an event. Try it now!
